description: Main React component for the Notes application, managing state, data loading, and rendering child components.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Asynchronously loads notes from the service based on the search query and updates the state.

methods.name: onNew
methods.description: Creates a new note with default title and content, then updates the state.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Saves updates to a note, then reloads notes and updates the state.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note after user confirmation, then updates the notes list.
